channel.title: about_me on chenbrian
channel.description: Recent content in about_me on chenbrian

item.title: Hi, I'm Brian
item.description: And I’m a student, software developer, and pokemon go enthusiast … and let’s put a face to the name as well I’m a student at the University of Toronto Engineering Science program passionate about identifying problems in the world around me and creating solutions for them. When I’m not cramming for school, I enjoy cooking and playing badminton. While you’re here, why don’t you check out my about me page? Or, take a look at my blog?

item.title: About me
item.description: What am I up to right now? aUToronto Systems & Simulations team: Automated testing & evaluation of autonomous vehicles Research @ ISML: I work with accelerating machine learning tasks on memristor crossbars – first author paper pending submission Web dev & data collection for BC Parks Foundation: currently in public alpha Side Projects TA-ing programming Trying to make it through university! Connect with me: Check out my cooking instagram
